actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill authorizing the construction, repair and preservation of certain public works on rivers for flood control.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to provide the city of South Williamson, Kentucky, and other populated places on the Kentucky side of the Tug Fork in Pike and Martain Counties, Kentucky, with comprehensive flood protection projects.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the construction, repair and preservation of certain public works on rivers for flood control.
